H0.text: Which fashion designer was suspended by Dior after making anti-semitic remarks in a Paris bar in 2011. Marc Jacobs

H1.text: Which fashion designer was suspended by Dior after making anti-semitic remarks in a Paris bar in 2011. Alexander McQueen

H2.text: Which fashion designer was suspended by Dior after making anti-semitic remarks in a Paris bar in 2011. Vivienne Westwood

H3.text: Which fashion designer was suspended by Dior after making anti-semitic remarks in a Paris bar in 2011. John Galliano

A4.text: Dior announced their suspension of Galliano including the following statement: Because of the particularly odious character of the behaviour and comments made by John Galliano in a video made public on Monday, the Dior house decided to suspend him immediately and has engaged in a process to dismiss him.

A5.text: Galliano was to face trial in Paris for allegedly making antisemitic comments to two fellow customers in a caf√©.
